Soaring Eagle wrote:

> Well... I guess I am saying that I cannot see anything that you may
> miss. Thanks.

I don't have extensive practical experience at it, but from what I see, 
any HTTP client oriented tests (using HTMLUnit, HTTPUnit, whatever) 
should be enough. Whether it's a great solution is another story.
